name: Memories (itch) (dardasaba)
description:
*full screen recommended*

You're an old man, suffering from Alzheimer's. You don't remember anything about your life, and the doctors say you probably never will. Are they right? It's all up to you!

Play as an abstract character in the abstract representation of the man's mind! It is a messy place, filled with dust, cobwebs, and random junk, but among it there are also your memories, buried deep inside. But beware, for you might uncover unfortunate past traumas...

Explore the mind's space, find pieces of memories to bring them to the brain's control center, and fight down old traumas... quite literally. Make sure you get rid of the traumas, or else the old man will remember the more uncomfortable parts of his life...
